property.name: db_path
property.description: Path where the mongodb is stored.

property.name: bind_ip
property.description: Interface on which to listen, by default all interfaces. Set for example, 127.0.0.1 to switch to the local loopback interface only. Or set to a specific internal IP if known. If you don't know the specific internal IP here, you should set mongodb_host instead to the hostname of the master server. This will make client connections easier.

property.name: tcp_port
property.description: Port on which mongod listens for incoming client connections. The Web Status page is always 1000 higher than this port number
